import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';

Any transaction with an amount that is below the minimum
[storage deposit](/learn/protocols/stardust/core-concepts/storage-deposit) is considered a
microtransaction.

The IOTA SDK has a convenient
[`TransactionOption`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/TransactionOptions.md#allowmicroamount)
called [`allowMicroAmount`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/TransactionOptions.md#allowmicroamount) to help you easily
send a microtransaction.

<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>

<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/). and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Send a micro transaction using the
   [`Wallet.send()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.send) function with
   the [`TransactionOption::allow_micro_amount`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.TransactionOptions.html#structfield.allow_micro_amount)
   set as `true`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/send_micro_transaction.rs#L47-L56
```

</div>

3. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/send_micro_transaction.rs#L59-L61
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Send a micro transaction using the
   [`Wallet.send()` function](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#send) with
   the [`TransactionOption:allowMicroAmount
    `](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/TransactionOptions.md#allowmicroamount) set as `true`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/send_micro_transaction.ts#L38-L44
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/). and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Send a micro transaction using the
   [`Wallet.send_with_params()` function](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#send_with_params) with
   the [`TransactionOption:allowMicroAmount`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/transaction_options/) set as `true`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/send_micro_transaction.ts#L38-L44
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
function.


<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/advanced_transactions/send_micro_transaction.py#L32-L33
```

</div>
</TabItem>

</Tabs>
